languages.text: On first wielder's kill per round, remove the cooldown on their Arbites abilities and their next attack auto-hits.

traits.locale_text: On first wielder's kill per round, remove the cooldown on their Arbites abilities and their next attack auto-hits.

languages.text: Когда персонаж убивает цель впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} автоматически совершает попадание. Также, если он является арбитром, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} арбитра, использованные в этом раунде, можно применить повторно.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж убивает цель впервые за раунд, его следующая атака автоматически совершает попадание. Также, если он является арбитром, способности арбитра, использованные в этом раунде, можно применить повторно.

Когда персонаж убивает цель впервые за раунд, его следующая атака автоматически совершает попадание. Также, если он является арбитром, способности арбитра, использованные в этом раунде, можно применить повторно.

languages.text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж убивает цель впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} автоматически совершает попадание. Также, если он является арбитром, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} арбитра, использованные в этом раунде, можно применить повторно.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer kills the target for the first time in a round, their next attack automatically hits. The wearer's Arbitrator abilities which were already used this round can be used again.

When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir hedefi öldürürse bir sonraki saldırısı otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}. Takan kişi, o rauntta kullanmış olduğu Yargıcı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} bir kez daha kullanabilir.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, bir rauntta ilk kez bir hedefi öldürürse bir sonraki saldırısı otomatik olarak vurur. Takan kişi, o rauntta kullanmış olduğu Yargıcı kabiliyetlerini bir kez daha kullanabilir.

Takan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir hedefi öldürürse bir sonraki saldırısı otomatik olarak vurur. Takan kişi, o rauntta kullanmış olduğu Yargıcı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} bir kez daha kullanabilir.

languages.text: Cuando el portador mate a un objetivo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, su próximo ataque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} automáticamente. Las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de Arbitrator del portador que se usen en este asalto pueden volver a utilizarse.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mate a un objetivo por primera vez en un asalto, su próximo ataque impacta automáticamente. Las capacidades de Arbitrator del portador que se usen en este asalto pueden volver a utilizarse.

languages.text: 当装备者在每轮中首次击杀目标时，装备者的下次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标。此外，装备者本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中使用过的法务官{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以再次使用。
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者在每轮中首次击杀目标时，装备者的下次攻击必定命中目标。此外，装备者本轮中使用过的法务官能力可以再次使用。

languages.text: Tötet der Träger ein Ziel zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} sein nächster Angriff automatisch. Die in dieser Runde eingesetzten Arbitrator-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers können erneut eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

traits.locale_text: Tötet der Träger ein Ziel zum ersten Mal in einer Runde, trifft sein nächster Angriff automatisch. Die in dieser Runde eingesetzten Arbitrator-Fähigkeiten des Trägers können erneut eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur tue une cible pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, sa prochaine attaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} automatiquement. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} d'arbitrator que le porteur a utilisé au cours de ce round peuvent être réutilisées.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur tue une cible pour la première fois au cours d'un round, sa prochaine attaque touche automatiquement. Les capacités d'arbitrator que le porteur a utilisé au cours de ce round peuvent être réutilisées.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてターゲットを倒すと、次の攻撃が自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する。このラウンドで使用したアービトレイターの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}をもう一度使用できる。
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がラウンドで初めてターゲットを倒すと、次の攻撃が自動的に命中する。このラウンドで使用したアービトレイターのアビリティをもう一度使用できる。
使用者がラウンドで初めてターゲットを倒すと、次の攻撃が自動的に命中する。このラウンドで使用したアービトレイターのアビリティをもう一度使用できる。
